detail_desc: Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back with a decorative ring and narrow straps at the back. Elasticated hem. Light support.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back with a decorative ring and narrow straps at the back. Elasticated hem. Light support.
Straight-cut yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Cut out section on one shoulder and at the back.
Straight-cut yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Cut out section on one shoulder and at the back.
Straight-cut yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Cut out section on one shoulder and at the back.

Fitted yoga jumpsuit in stretch, fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow double shoulder straps that cross at the back, shaped cups with removable inserts and mesh details at the top, and a cut-out section at the back. Seam under the bust and at the waist, and decorative crossed straps at the hems.

Sports top in fast-drying thermal fleece with a drawstring hood. Zip at the top, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Sports top in fast-drying thermal fleece with a drawstring hood. Zip at the top, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Sports top in fast-drying thermal fleece with a drawstring hood. Zip at the top, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Lightly padded, fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric containing some scuba. High stand-up collar with an integral hood, a zip down the front and concealed zipped side pockets. Extended inner ribbing with thumbholes, and reflective details. Slightly longer at the back. Partially lined.

Soft, non-wired bras, one in lace and one in jersey, that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, mesh-lined cups and hole-patterned elastic under the bust. No fasteners.

Soft, non-wired bras, one in lace and one in jersey, that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, mesh-lined cups and hole-patterned elastic under the bust. No fasteners.

Ultra-light running shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated waist and ventilating mesh sections in the sides. Zipped key pocket at the back, side pockets, short slits in the sides and reflective details. Lined. the shorts weigh 120 grammes in size M.
Fully lined swimsuit with frill-trimmed shoulder straps, frills at the top and a seam at the waist.

Hooded top in jersey with a print motif on the front kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length pleated trousers in a woven fabric with a glittery finish. Loose-fit with velvet-covered elastic at the waist and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Double-breasted jacket in a checked weave with slightly wider lapels, a tapered waist with pleats front and back, and flap front pockets. Lined.
